gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 136, Grizzlies 124
gameRecap.excerpt: The Lakers defeated the Grizzlies, 136-124. Rui Hachimura led Los Angeles with 32 points, 10 rebounds, and a career-high seven 3PM as LeBron James added the fourth triple-double of the season (111th of career) with 23 points, 14 rebounds, and 12 assists. D'Angelo Russell added 23 points and five 3PM in the win. Desmond Bane led Memphis with 26 points and a career-high 16 assists while Jake LaRavia added a career-high 25 points and seven 3PM.
